facts.fact_text: Armenia’s annual inflation rate rose to 3.8% in January 2026 from 3.3% in the previous month.

evidences.evidence_text: Armenia’s annual inflation rate rose to 3.8% in January 2026 from 3.3% in the previous month

facts.fact_text: The inflation rate of 3.8% in January 2026 is the highest reading since June 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: marking the highest reading since June 2025.

facts.fact_text: Prices increased for food and non-alcoholic beverages by 5.9% in January 2026, compared to 4.3% in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Prices increased for food and non-alcoholic beverages (5.9% vs 4.3% in December 2025)

facts.fact_text: On a monthly basis, consumer prices increased by 2% in January 2026, following a 1.2% gain in the prior month.

evidences.evidence_text: On a monthly basis, consumer prices increased by 2% in January, following a 1.2% gain in the prior month.

evidence.evidence_text: Armenia’s annual inflation rate rose to 3.8% in January 2026 from 3.3% in the previous month, marking the highest reading since June 2025.
Prices increased for food and non-alcoholic beverages (5.9% vs 4.3% in December 2025)
